出撃に許可が下りないってのはどういうことだ！？: What do you mean you can't get permission to sortie?!

<r-primal belt>You can go to the primogenitor belt, right?!
公式ＭＧ競技で良い戦績を残せば、\nそれがメイズでの探索許可エリアに反映されるは:

その通りです。実力を認めていないわけではありません。: That's right. It's not that I don't acknowledge your abilities.
な、なんでですか？ 私達、何か問題を起こしちゃいましたか？: Wh-Why? Did we cause any problems?

You haven't completed the basic training course for the pilot course yet.

メイズ探索において最も脅威となるのがメイズシフターの襲撃です。: When it comes to searching for Mayse, the biggest threat is the attack on Mayse-Sifter.
公式ＭＧ競技はパイロットの戦闘能力向上を目的とした、\n訓練のひとつに過ぎません:
The official MG competition was aimed at improving the pilot’s combat abilities

<r-primal belt> After the Primogenitor belt <r>, the look of searching for the maise was...

それゆえ刻一刻と変化する地形や環境の違いを読み取る方法や、\nメイズシフターへの:
As such, there were ways to read the differences in the terrain and environment that changed with each passing moment
She said she needed to learn how to deal with the Mazesifter.
本来はそういった知識や技術を基礎訓練課程で学ぶのだが、\n俺はそれを知らない。:
Normally, such knowledge and techniques would be learned in the basic training course, but...
I don't know that.
なるほどな。\nみんなはその基礎訓練課程っていうのをやったのか？:
I see what you mean.
Did everyone do that basic training course?
はい。入学してすぐの頃に受けてます。: Yes. I took it right after I enrolled here.
でも結構前のことだしね。あんまりよく覚えてなかったりして。: But it was a long time ago. Maybe I don't remember it very well.
ずーと<r=ケイブ・ベルト>地穴帯</r>で足止め食らってたもんねー。: We've been stuck in the <r-cave belt> earthhole belt for a long time, haven't we?
使わない知識はいずれ消えゆく。: Knowledge that you don't use will eventually disappear.
もう１つ残っている問題はそこです。: That's the other problem I have left.

I've been staying here for a while now, so I'm a little worried about my training.
戦闘力や戦術能力は十分です。\nですがそれだけでは、<r=プライマル・ベルト>原:

So, for those of you who are here

We immediately boarded the aircraft, preparing to undergo retraining
We gathered in front of the portal.

どこかの誰かみたいにでかい声じゃないのがいいなー。: It'd be nice if it wasn't as loud as someone else's.

カラフルブーケの夕凪舞亜と波瀬うるうだ。: Maia Yuunagi and Uru Namise from the colorful bouquet.
俺達は互いに一旦機体から降りて、顔を合わせた。: We get off the aircraft and meet face-to-face.
